## Checklist

Ensure you completed **all of the steps** below before submitting your pull request:

- [ ] Ran `forge fmt`?
- [ ] Ran `forge snapshot`?
- [ ] Ran `forge test`?

_Pull requests with an incomplete checklist will be thrown out._
